dream_text: Ever dreamed of a place to escape to—a sanctuary where you can connect with like-minded women from around the world, learn new skills, collaborate, and unwind together amidst the beauty of the beach and forest? Femitopia is that safe haven—a vibrant community offering volunteering, coworking, festivals, vacations, workshops, and more—whether you come to grow, create, or simply relax and recharge.
discover_subtitle: A hidden gem on Mexico's Pacific Coast
zipolite_text: Zipolite, located in Oaxaca, Mexico, is known for its peaceful atmosphere and nudist-friendly beach. Its 1.75 km of sandy coastline is perfect for swimming and surfing. Enjoy the consistent tropical weather. Visit charming towns like Mazunte, or head to Huatulco Bay and Puerto Escondido for more adventures. Spot wildlife such as dolphins, and migrating whales.
join_text: Femitopia is a welcoming community where women come together to connect, heal, and support each other. Set by the ocean and rooted in love, respect, and eco-friendly values, we live, work, and grow side by side. Together, we're building meaningful connections and creating a lasting legacy of hope, empowerment, and shared purpose. Join us and be part of something truly special.
community_p1: Bring your true self to our space. We're a community where everyone is open, honest, and ready to grow. If you love nature, being by the ocean, and feel comfortable in sex-positive, nudist spaces, you'll fit right in.
community_p2: Know your community, respect pronouns, bring your skills or be ready to learn, and keep an open heart. Together, we'll create something special.
stay_subtitle: We're currently building our unique accommodations in the heart of nature
stay_apt_text: Modern living spaces currently under construction, featuring solar lighting for an eco-conscious stay.
stay_cabin_text: Charming wooden cabins in the planning phase, coming soon to complement our natural surroundings.
stay_camp_text: Elevated platforms for a unique glamping experience, coming soon.
vision_subtitle: We're working towards creating a vibrant community space with amenities including:
vision_food_text: Beer & Wine Shop • Coffee Shop • Restaurant • Ice Cream
vision_wellness_text: Queer Beauty Salon & Barbershop • Yoga • Spa & Massages
vision_community_text: Workshops • Live Music • Working Stations • Tattoo Studio
vision_services_text: Car & Scooter Rental • Electronics and Tech Support
volunteer_title: Help us build from the ground up
volunteer_subtitle: We're starting from scratch and need your skills to make this dream a reality.
vol_construction_text: Help us construct our eco-friendly structures, from foundations to finishes.
vol_land_text: Shape our outdoor spaces with sustainable land management practices.
vol_creative_text: Bring artistic vision to our spaces and community initiatives.
vol_noskill_text: We welcome all skill levels. What matters most is your passion and willingness to learn.
map_address: Calle Cresta 88, Arroyo Tres, 70947 Oaxaca, Mexico
map_location: Calle Cresta 88, Arroyo Tres, 70947 Oaxaca, Mexico
contact_address: Calle Cresta 88, Arroyo Tres, 70947 Oaxaca, Mexico
footer_tagline: A safe space for queer women to connect, understand, and support each other.
updates_carpentry_text: In March and April 2026 we will be offering an opportunity to learn carpentry. Contact us for more information.
eco_subtitle: Femitopia is built on sustainable principles — we care for the land as much as we care for our community.
eco_water_text: We use a Biotar system to recycle gray and black water, which is then used to nourish our banana, papaya, and maracuyá plants.
eco_forest_text: We have started an edible forest with mango, avocado, lemon, and coconut trees — growing food while restoring the land.
eco_solar_text: Our solar panels supply the electricity we need, reducing our carbon footprint and keeping us off the grid.
eco_rain_text: Our roof is specially designed to collect rainwater, providing a natural and sustainable water source for the community.
